mapper.insert: insert into WM.SYS_MENU (PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, iconCls, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMAKR, CREATEUSER, TS, DR) values (#{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adminflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{menutype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remakr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update WM.SYS_MENU set MENUCODE = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUNAME = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAYNAME = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAYORDER = #{displayorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEV = #{lev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENTCODE = #{parentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconCls = #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLEFLAG = #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADMINFLAG = #{adminflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENUTYPE = #{menutype,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMAKR = #{remakr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_SYS_MENU = #{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, iconCls, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMAKR, CREATEUSER, TS, DR from WM.SYS_MENU where PK_SYS_MENU = #{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, iconCls, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMAKR, CREATEUSER, TS, DR from WM.SYS_MENU where MENUCODE = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, iconCls, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMAKR, CREATEUSER, TS, DR from WM.SYS_MENU

SELECT DISTINCT A.PK_SYS_MENU, A.MENUCODE, A.MENUNAME, A.DISPLAYNAME, A.DISPLAYORDER, A.LEV, A.PARENTCODE, A.iconCls, A.URL,A. ENABLEFLAG, A.ADMINFLAG, A.MENUTYPE, A.REMAKR, A.CREATEUSER, A.TS, A.DR FROM SYS_MENU A JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU B ON A.PK_SYS_MENU=B.PK_SYS_MENU AND NVL(A.DR,0)=0 JOIN SYS_ROLE C ON B.PK_SYS_ROLE=C.PK_SYS_ROLE AND NVL(C.DR,0)=0 JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE D ON C.PK_SYS_ROLE = D.PK_SYS_ROLE JOIN SYS_USER E ON D.PK_SYS_USER = E.PK_SYS_USER AND NVL(E.FLAG,0)=0 AND NVL(E.DR,0)=0 WHERE 1=1 AND A.LEV=1 AND E.PK_SYS_USER = #{pk_sys_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.DISPLAYORDER

SELECT DISTINCT A.PK_SYS_MENU, A.MENUCODE, A.MENUNAME, A.DISPLAYNAME, A.DISPLAYORDER, A.LEV, A.PARENTCODE, A.iconCls, A.URL,A. ENABLEFLAG, A.ADMINFLAG, A.MENUTYPE, A.REMAKR, A.CREATEUSER, A.TS, A.DR FROM SYS_MENU A JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU B ON A.PK_SYS_MENU=B.PK_SYS_MENU AND NVL(A.DR,0)=0 JOIN SYS_ROLE C ON B.PK_SYS_ROLE=C.PK_SYS_ROLE AND NVL(C.DR,0)=0 JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE D ON C.PK_SYS_ROLE = D.PK_SYS_ROLE JOIN SYS_USER E ON D.PK_SYS_USER = E.PK_SYS_USER AND NVL(E.FLAG,0)=0 AND NVL(E.DR,0)=0 WHERE 1=1 AND A.LEV>1 AND E.PK_SYS_USER = #{pk_sys_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.DISPLAYORDER
